import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function RoommateSearch() { const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ budget: '', leaseDuration: '', smoking: '', drinking: '', genderPreference: '', }); // Mock data without compatibility const roommates = [ { id: 1, name: "Sarah Johnson", budget: 2000, leaseDuration: 12, smoking: "non-smoking", drinking: "non-drinking", genderPreference: "single-gender", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330" }, { id: 2, name: "Michael Chen", budget: 1500, leaseDuration: 6, smoking: "non-smoking", drinking: "drinking", genderPreference: "multiple-gender", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d" }, // Add more mock data as needed ]; return (
{/* Back Button and Header */}
Back to Home

Find Your Perfect Roommate

Connect with potential roommates who share your lifestyle, interests, and academic goals.

{/* Filters Section */}
{/* Results Grid */}
{roommates.map((roommate) => (

{roommate.name}

${roommate.budget}/month • {roommate.leaseDuration} months

{roommate.smoking} {roommate.drinking} {roommate.genderPreference}
))}
); } export default RoommateSearch;
